Package org.tweetyproject.arg.peaf.syntax

Class AbstractEAFTheory<S extends ESupport>

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.arg.peaf.syntax.AbstractEAFTheory<S>
Type Parameters:
S - the support link (ESupport or PSupport)
Direct Known Subclasses:
EAFTheory, PEAFTheory
public abstract class AbstractEAFTheory<S extends ESupport> extends Object
A base class for implementing PEAFTheory and EAFTheory.
Author:
Taha Dogan Gunes

      Creates an attack object (does not add to the internal abstract object)
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the attack
      froms - the set of arguments that the attack originates from
      tos - the set of arguments that the attack targets

      EAttack object
